record.field: The kit "%s" has the flag "Explode in Sales" checked. All of its components must be "salable", but not all are configured this way.
The components of a kit with the flag "Explode in Sales" checked must be "salable".
The kit "%s" is marked as purchasable, but kits can not be purchasable.
For the customer of sale line "%(line)s" on sale "%(sale)s" there is no customer location defined.
